title:
Exponential scalar mixing for the 2D Navier-Stokes equations with
  degenerate stochastic forcing
abstract:
We show exponential mixing of passive scalars advected by a solution to the
stochastic Navier-Stokes equations with finitely many (e.g. four) forced modes
satisfying a hypoellipticity condition. Our proof combines the asymptotic
strong Feller framework of Hairer and Mattingly with the mixing theory of
Bedrossian, Blumenthal, and Punshon-Smith.
